snippet: An end to the Cuba embargo would send a signal to Latin America that the United States wants a new relationship with democratic forces seeking social change throughout the Americas.
lead_paragraph: An end to the Cuba embargo would send a signal to Latin America that the United States wants a new relationship with democratic forces seeking social change throughout the Americas.

headline.print_headline: After Chávez, a Chance to Rethink Relations With Cuba
headline.seo: After Chávez, Hope for Good Neighbors in Latin America
headline.main: After Chávez, a Chance to Rethink Relations With Cuba
